title: Stats
text:
source

fetch_match_stats

 fetch_match_stats (match_id)


match_stats = fetch_match_stats(match_id = sample_match_id)
print(json.dumps(json.loads(match_stats), indent = 4))


source


save_match_stats

 save_match_stats (stats, filepath)


filepath = data_dir / f'stats/{sample_match_id}.txt'
save_match_stats(match_stats, filepath)

title: Matches
text:
source

fetch_matches

 fetch_matches ()


matches_data = fetch_matches()
print(json.dumps(json.loads(matches_data), indent = 4))


source


save_matches

 save_matches (data, filepath)


save_matches(matches_data, filepath = data_dir / 'matches.txt')


source


get_live_matches

 get_live_matches (filepath, now=datetime.datetime(2025, 9, 14, 1, 21, 7,
                   897880, tzinfo=<DstTzInfo 'Asia/Kolkata' IST+5:30:00
                   STD>))

title: Wallstream
text:
source

fetch_wallstream

 fetch_wallstream (match_id)


match_wallstream = fetch_wallstream(match_id = sample_match_id)
print(json.dumps(json.loads(match_wallstream), indent = 4))


source


save_wallstream

 save_wallstream (wallstream, filepath)


filepath = data_dir / f'wallstream/{sample_match_id}.txt'
save_wallstream(match_wallstream, filepath)

title: Indian Super League (ISL)
text:
Development
# Make sure `indian_super_league` package is installed in development mode.
$ pip install -e '.[dev]'

# Make changes under nbs/ directory.
# ...

# Preview your documentation locally.
$ nbdev_preview

# Compile to have changes apply to the `indian_super_league` package.
$ nbdev_prepare
